title: Create an Order
body: Successfully create an order with order id {{ .order_id }}

title: Someone has Ordered
body: Someone Ordered Your Product with order id {{ .order_id }}

title: Order Finished
body: Your order has finished by {{ .username }} with order id {{ .order_id }} and product id {{ .product_id }}

title: Alert Stock Product
body: Your product stock is less than 3, immediately add your product stock with product id {{ .product_id }}

title: Your Product Has Been Shipped
body: Your Product {{ .product_id }} has been shipped by {{ .store_id }}

title: Seller has response Your review
body: {{ .store_name }} has give response to your review in product {{ .product_id }}
